title: #EID_47597_RECSBox_PCIePort.v0_1_0

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ConnectedSystems.description: This is a link to a collection of ComputerSystems connected to this port.
ConnectedSystems.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the ComputerSystem schema.

ConnectedDevices.description: This is a link to a collection of PCIeDevices connected to this port.
ConnectedDevices.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the PCIeDevice schema.

ConnectedSwitches.description: This is a link to a collection of PCIeSwitches connected to this port.
ConnectedSwitches.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the PCIeSwitch schema.

Links.description: Base type for an Oem object.
Links.longDescription: This object represents the base type for an Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Host.description: The host of this PCIePort. This can either be a ComputerSystem, a PCIeSwitch or a Baseboard.
Host.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference that complies to the ComputerSystem, PCIeSwitch or Baseboard schema.

Connections.description: This is a link to a collection of connections that use this port.
Connections.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the HSLLConnection schema.
